credit_line: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
title: Design for Golf Trophy Cup
medium: In pen in black ink, yellow color pencil, white chalk, graphite, on cream tracing paper
description:
Round flaring bowl drawn in plan and elevation, upper center with applied square panel indicated in yellow pencil to be executed in veermeil. Raised on a short circular base decorated with embedded golf balls on four sides and a central inlaid band indicated in yellow color pencil to be executed in vermeil. Underdrawing in graphite of bowl in golden section.
Puiforcat collection contains archival photograph of cup, Box 9, Folder 19, "Cups, 9000 series," # 9119.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 9119, Coupe forme boule 4 boules ivoire avec applique relief
name: Drawing
